question: Which country houses the headquarters of the "BNP Paribas"?
explanation: The headquarters of the international banking group BNP Paribas is located in Paris, the capital city of France. BNP Paribas is a French international banking group. It is the world's 8th largest bank by total assets and currently operates with a presence in 72 countries. It was formed through the merger of Banque Nationale de Paris (BNP) and Paribas in 2000 but has a corporate identity stretching back to its first foundation in 1848 as a national bank. It is one of three major international French banks, along with Société Générale and Crédit Agricole. The group is listed on the first market of Euronext Paris and a component of the Euro Stoxx 50 stock market index, while it also included in the French CAC 40 index.
